LightningComponentBundle.description: Modern messaging component for communicating with users and contacts

property.name: componentHeight
property.label: Component Height
property.description: Height of the messaging component in pixels. If set to 0 or if the container is smaller, the component will adapt to available space.

property.name: disableInitialLoading
property.label: Disable Initial Loading
property.description: When enabled, the component will not show a loading spinner on initialization, making it easier to remove from the page.

property.name: primaryColor
property.label: Primary Color
property.description: Primary color used for headers, navigation elements, buttons, badges, and interactive elements. Controls the color of the conversation and chat headers, the 'new message' button, and the unread message badge.

property.name: accentColor
property.label: Accent Color
property.description: Secondary accent color used for hover states, highlights, and selected elements. Controls button hover effects and active state indicators like the left border of selected conversations.

property.name: messageOutgoingColor
property.label: Outgoing Message Color
property.description: Background color for message bubbles sent by the current user (appears on the right side). Text color will automatically adjust to be black or white based on this color's brightness.

property.name: messageIncomingColor
property.label: Incoming Message Color
property.description: Background color for message bubbles received from other users (appears on the left side). Text color will automatically adjust to be black or white based on this color's brightness.
